title: What services does HCL Technologies provide? - Quora

response.answer_text: Below are the services provided by HCL technologies. I got this data from IT Services, Digital Solutions, Technology Consulting (IT Services, Digital Solutions, Technology Consulting). INFRASTRUCTURE: IT Infrastructure Management Services Experience IT infrastructure for a 21st Century Enterprise Cloud Computing Your preferred transformation partner in the journey to the cloud Data Center Services Explore Industry Leading Innovation on Data Center and Cloud Mainframe and AS400 Experience high availability and scalability of your IT infrastructure Network Services Strengthen IT infrastructure with best-in-class Managed Services DRYiCE Make IT Agile and Lean using DRYiCE Service Integration and Management (SIAM) Evolve your service management portfolio with SIAM Gold Blue Print Workplace Services Enhance productivity with 21st Century Workplace services APPLICATIONS: Digital Consulting Design-led Reimagining of Business Processes & Customer Experience Digital Applications & Platforms Modern Applications and Platforms that make Digital a reality Business Analytics Data and Analytics Backbone to Power Digital Transformation SAP Global SAP leader with comprehensive range of services Oracle Business transformation services across entire Oracle ecosystem Microsoft Comprehensive consulting to implementation services Business Assurance and Testing Services Accelerate time-to-market with Quality as a core business strategy Application Development Modernize Legacy platforms to address new business needs Application Maintenance Make Proactive Obsolescence your Business Advantage ENGINEERING: Engineering and R&D Services Engineering experiences with differentiated outcomes Embedded Engineering Next generation embedded software engineering services Hardware Product Engineering Domain-Led Concept-to-Manufacture services for Quick turnaround Mechanical Engineering Product Customization with end to end design services Product Lifecycle in Class Finance and Accounting Outsourcing (FAO) Reimagine Finance with Enterprise-Function as-a Service Human Resource Outsourcing (HRO) Drive Business outcomes by optimizing resource utilization
